ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class ViewTaskBiddedBottomSheetFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.ViewTaskBottomSheetFragment
        • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.ViewTaskBiddedBottomSheetFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ViewTaskBiddedBottomSheetFragment
extends ViewTaskBottomSheetFragment
    Bottom sheet to use for a task requester viewing a task of their own that has been bidded on. Has no contents, but will be bound to open a view of the current BidList on click.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateView

        @Nullable
public android.view.View onCreateView(android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                                @Nullable
                                                android.view.ViewGroup container,
                                                android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Description copied from class: ViewTaskBottomSheetFragment
        Creates the view. The base layout is inflated from activity_view_task_bottom_sheet. This is a templatized method which is partially defined by subclasses: - getBackgroundColor() determines the color of the bottom sheet - getStatusString() determines the primary status text to display on the collapsed sheet - getContentLayout() determines the View that will be displayed when the sheet is expanded - initializeWithTask() is called after main initialization completes, and is intended for the subclass to fill in its detailed status fields and any expanded-view content that is dependent on the task being manipulated. Subclasses can additionally override onCreateView to effect more complex specialization.
        Overrides:
        onCreateView in class ViewTaskBottomSheetFragment

      • initializeWithTask

        protected void initializeWithTask(android.view.ViewGroup container,
                                  Task task)
        Description copied from class: ViewTaskBottomSheetFragment
        Initializes the bottom sheet contents from a task object. This will set the header fields appropriately, and possibly initialize the sheet contents if they require initializing. This is called from the default onCreateView.
        Specified by:
        initializeWithTask in class ViewTaskBottomSheetFragment
        Parameters:
        container - ViewGroup containing the header and content frame
        task - task object to initialize from

      • getStatusString

        protected java.lang.String getStatusString()
        Description copied from class: ViewTaskBottomSheetFragment
        Determines the status message to be displayed on the sheet. (eg. "Open") This is called from the default onCreateView and displayed in the upper left of the collapsed sheet.
        Specified by:
        getStatusString in class ViewTaskBottomSheetFragment
        Returns:
        always bidded
